entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 11:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
